addNetworks.title: Fa Networks Ka Ho
addNetworks.description: Mia button a ɛwɔ aseɛ ha de Fa Networks ka wo wallet ho. Eyi ma no yɛ mmerɛ sɛ wobɛsesa chains ntam bere a woreyɛ nsɔhwɛ.

tabs.convert: Yi fi buw mu / Fa buw mu

convert.noConvertibleTokens: Token a wobɛtumi akyekyere biara nni {{chainName}} so
convert.addToWalletLabel: Fa {{symbol}} a ɛwɔ {{chainName}} so kɔ wallet mu
convert.addTokenError: Antumi amfa token ankɔ wallet mu
convert.legacyTokenMissing: Tete token nni chain yi so
convert.tigerOGMissing: TigerOG token nni chain yi so

networkWarning.title: Network a Ɛnteɛ
networkWarning.message: Buw mu kɔ ne buw mu fi yɛ adwuma wɔ BSC Chain nko ara so.
networkWarning.description: Yɛsrɛ wo kɔ BSC Chain so wɔ wo wallet mu sɛ wopɛ sɛ wokyekyere tokens, anaa kɔ Nkabom tab no so sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode tokens fi chain baako so kɔ foforo so.

bridge.noBridgeableTokens: Token a wobɛtumi de atwa nkabom biara nni hɔ
bridge.addDestinationTokenLabel: Fa {{symbol}} a ɛwɔ {{chainName}} so kɔ wallet mu
bridge.addTokenError: Antumi amfa token ankɔ wallet mu
bridge.historyStoredLocally: Wɔkora sika ho nsɛm so wɔ mfiri yi so

settings.title: Nhyehyɛe
settings.rpcEndpointsHelp: Sesa RPC URL a wɔde di dwuma wɔ chain biara so wɔ tebea a woayi no mu.
settings.noChainsConfigured: Chain biara nni hɔ a wɔahyehyɛ ama tebea yi.

login.title: Akwaaba bio
login.subtitle: Fa wo ho hyɛ mu na kɔ so wɔ Freedom Bridge
login.rememberMe: Kae me wɔ mfiri yi so

banner.title: Wofoforo ha?
banner.message: Sua Freedom Bridge ne sɛdeɛ wobɛyi wo ho afiri token toɔ mu.

hero.title: Yi Wo <1/> <2>Agyapadeɛ</2> Fi Buw Mu
hero.subtitle: Fa TigerOG tokens twa nkabom wɔ chains ntam a ɛyɛ mmerɛ na ahobammɔ wɔ mu denam Axelar Interchain Token Service so. Ɛyɛ ntɛm na toɔ nni mu.

features.title: Interchain Token Service
features.description: Freedom Bridge fa Axelar ITS adwuma de ma nkabom a ɛyɛ mmerɛ, ahobammɔ, ne toɔ a wonntua wɔ blockchains {{count}}+ so.

stopDecay.title: Gyae Porɔe No
stopDecay.description: Tete tokens hyew wo boɔ 10-11% wɔ tɔ ne tɔn biara mu. Kyekyere gyae mogya a ɛreba no ntɛm ara, na ɛkora wo tumi a wode tɔ nneɛma so 100% ma adwuma biara.

conversion.title: 1:1 Nkyekyere
conversion.description: Nea ɛwɔ hɔ nyinaa nsesa da. Wɔde Tokens to adaka a ahobammɔ wɔ mu mu, na wɔyɛ nea ɛte saa pɛpɛɛpɛ 1:1. Sika a ɛreba no nnyɛ kɛse, nsu a wɔde gu mu nni hɔ.

multichain.title: Chains Pii
multichain.description: Yɛ no pɛnkoro, fa di dwuma baabiara. Wo agyapadeɛ yɛ ɔman ba wɔ chains {{count}}+ so a Ethereum, BNB Chain, Base, ne Optimism ka ho.

security.title: Axelar Ahobammɔ
security.description: Axelar ahobammɔ a ɛyɛ modular na ɛhyɛ akyi. ITS hwɛ sɛ wo tokens kɔ baabi a worede kɔ no wɔ ahobammɔ mu wɔ networks nyinaa so.

cta.title: Woasiesie wo ho sɛ wobɛbɔ wo ho?
cta.description: Fa wo ho bɔ ntam chain anigyeɛ no. Ɛgye miniti baako pɛ sɛ wobɛkyekyere wo agyapadeɛ na woafi nkabom ase.

header.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ
header.subtitle: Sua sɛdeɛ wobɛkyekyere tete tokens, fa chains ntam, na fa Freedom Bridge ka ho.

whatIs.title: Freedom Bridge yɛ deɛn?
whatIs.content: Freedom Bridge yɛ protocol a ɛnyɛ mfinimfini na wɔayɛ de aboa ma nkabom a ɛda chains ntam, na ɛyɛ adwuma wɔ Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) so. Wɔayɛ no sɛ ɛbɛyi tokens afi chain baako anohyetoɔ mu ne transaksie toɔ a ɛyɛ den mu. Sɛ wode tokens kɔ ntam chain agyapadeɛ mu a, wobɛtumi de wo sika akɔ baabiara a wopɛ wɔ blockchains a yɛboa no mu.
whatIs.taxFreeDesc: Tete tokens taa kura 10%+ toɔ. TigerOG tokens kura 0% toɔ.
whatIs.omnichainDesc: Fa wo agyapadeɛ kɔ ntam blockchain {{count}}+ so ntɛm ara denam Axelar so.

howToConvert.title: Sɛdeɛ Wɔkyekyere Tokens
howToConvert.step1: Fa wo wallet bɔ chain a wode sika no refi aseɛ (nhwɛsoɔ, BNB Chain).
howToConvert.step2: Kɔ Yi fi buw mu / Fa buw mu tab no so.
howToConvert.step3: Yi tete token a wopɛ sɛ wode kɔ TigerOG mu no.
howToConvert.step4: Ma Migration contract no kwan sɛ ɛmfa wo tokens nni dwuma.
howToConvert.step5: Mia Kyekyere de wo tete tokens no bɛto hɔ na woanya TigerOG tokens a ɛne no yɛ pɛ.
howToConvert.note: Hyɛ no nsow: Wobɛtua tete token no transaksie toɔ (bere a worekyekyere no) sɛ wo token no gye toɔ wɔ nsesa mu a. Nanso, sɛ wode kɔ TigerOG mu wie a, transaksie biara a wobɛyɛ akyiri yi no toɔ biara nni mu.

supportedNetworks.title: Networks a Ɛwɔ Hɔ
supportedNetworks.content: Freedom Bridge boa blockchains {{count}}+ a ɛrekɔ anim, na ɛma nkabom a ɛyɛ mmerɛ ba EVM baabiara denam Axelar so.

xerc20.title: Interchain Tokens
xerc20.content: Axelar Interchain Token Service (ITS) ma kwan ma wɔde tokens kɔ chains pii so a address no nsesa na sika dodow no yɛ baako. Freedom Bridge fa ITS di dwuma de hwɛ sɛ TigerOG yɛ agyapadeɛ titiriw baabiara a wobɛde akɔ.

axelar.title: Axelar Network
axelar.content: Yɛde Axelar di dwuma sɛ yɛn nkabom layer. Axelar yɛ network a ɛnyɛ mfinimfini a ɛka blockchains ahorow bom, na ɛma nkitahodi ne agyapadeɛ nsesa a ahobammɔ wɔ mu kɔ so. Axelar ahobammɔ gyina validators bi a wɔnni kwan soronko so, na ɛma ahobammɔ a ɛyɛ den ma interchain tokens.

migration.title: Nkyekyere Logic
migration.content: Migration contract no wɔ chain a tete token no fii aseɛ (nhwɛsoɔ, BSC). Ɛkura tete tokens no mu. Sɛ wode tokens no kɔ TigerOG mu a, wode refa migration contract no mu. Sɛ woyi fi mu a, wode TigerOG tokens no rehyew na woanya tete tokens no afi migration contract no mu. Eyi hwɛ sɛ TigerOG ne tete token no dodow bɛyɛ pɛ 1:1 bere biara.

security.title: Ahobammɔ Model
security.content: Ahobammɔ yɛ biribi a ɛhia paa wɔ Freedom Bridge:
security.point1: Migration Architecture: Wɔkora tete tokens so wɔ slim kontrakts a wɔahwehwɛ mu na ɛnsesa.
security.point2: Axelar Validators: Axelar network na ɛhwɛ nkrasɛm a ɛda chains ntam no so.
security.point3: Sika Dodow a Ɛnsesa: ITS hwɛ sɛ dodow a wɔhyew ne nea wɔyɛ foforo no bɛyɛ pɛ na sika dodow no ansan da.
security.point4: Logic a Wɔahwehwɛ Mu: Wɔde Axelar ne OpenZeppelin nhyehyɛe na ɛyɛe.

supplyCommon.verificationDesc: Wobɛtumi ahwehwɛ sika nonta nyinaa mu wɔ chain so:

tigerogSupply.title: TigerOG Nkyekyɛmu
tigerogSupply.intro: TigerOG wɔ sika a ɛredidi mu a ɛnsesa a efi BNBTiger token a ɛwɔ hɔ dada no mu. Nkontabuo no fa tokens a wɔahyew ne nea wɔato mu koraa nyinaa ka ho.
tigerogSupply.lpLocked: LP Wɔato Mu (86.18% of LP Wɔahyew)
tigerogSupply.deadAddressDesc: Tokens a wɔde kɔ 0x000...dEaD no wɔahyew no koraa na wontumi nsan nnya. Eyi kɔ BNBTiger toɔ nhyehyɛe no mu nea wɔahyew.
tigerogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Tokens kakraa bi asi BNBTiger contract no ankasa mu. Tokens yi nni hɔ na wɔayi afi nea ɛredidi mu.
tigerogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool no wɔ BNBTiger tokens ne BNB. Sɛ wɔhyew LP tokens (wɔde kɔ address a awu no) a, tokens a ɛwɔ pool no mu no to mu koraa.
tigerogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens a wɔahyew: 86.18% of LP tokens nyinaa
tigerogSupply.lpLockedPercent: Enti, 86.18% of tokens a ɛwɔ LP no mu no wɔato mu koraa
tigerogSupply.note: Hyɛ no nsow: TigerOG kura 1:1 ratio ne BNBTiger wɔ nsesa no mu. TigerOG a ɛredidi mu no ne BNBTiger a ɛredidi mu nokware no yɛ pɛ bere a wɔabu nea wɔahyew ne nea wɔato mu nyinaa.
tigerogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Wɔbui nonta yi wɔ mfiase. BNBTiger token dedaw no kɔ so hyew tokens wɔ tɔ/tɔn biara mu, enti nea ɛredidi mu no betumi asuane kakra asene nea wɔakyerɛ no.

lionogSupply.title: LionOG Nkyekyɛmu
lionogSupply.intro: LionOG wɔ sika a ɛredidi mu a ɛnsesa a efi BNBLion token a ɛwɔ hɔ dada no mu. Nkontabuo no fa tokens a wɔahyew ne nea wɔato mu koraa nyinaa ka ho.

lionogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Tokens kakraa bi asi BNBLion contract no ankasa mu. Tokens yi nni hɔ na wɔayi afi nea ɛredidi mu.
lionogSupply.lpLockedDesc: PancakeSwap liquidity pool no wɔ BNBLion tokens ne BNB. Sɛ wɔhyew LP tokens (wɔde kɔ address a awu no) a, tokens a ɛwɔ pool no mu no to mu koraa.
lionogSupply.lpBurnedPercent: LP tokens a wɔahyew: 99.98% of LP tokens nyinaa

lionogSupply.launchData: Launch Data: Wɔbui nonta yi wɔ mfiase. BNBLion token dedaw no kɔ so hyew tokens wɔ tɔ/tɔn biara mu, enti nea ɛredidi mu no betumi asuane kakra asene nea wɔakyerɛ no.

frogogSupply.intro: FrogOG wɔ sika a ɛredidi mu a ɛnsesa a efi BNBFrog token a ɛwɔ hɔ dada no mu. Nkontabuo no fa tokens a wɔahyew ne nea wɔato mu koraa nyinaa ka ho.

frogogSupply.contractBalanceDesc: Tokens kakraa bi asi BNBFrog contract no ankasa mu. Tokens yi nni hɔ na wɔayi afi nea ɛredidi mu.

header.title: Slim Kontrakts
header.subtitle: Nkabom ne tokens addresses a wɔahyehyɛ wɔ Freedom Bridge mu.

faq.title: Freedom Bridge Mmoa
faq.subtitle: Mmuaeɛ ma nsɛmmisa a wɔtaa bisa fa TigerOG, nkabom, ne Axelar ho.

cta.title: Wopɛ sɛ wubisa biribi foforo?
cta.description: Fa wo ho bɔ yɛn community wɔ Telegram so anaa hwɛ Wiki no ma nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛkɔ akyiri.

questions.q1: Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ mekyekyere me tokens?
questions.a1: Sɛ wode wo tokens kɔ TigerOG mu a, transaksie toɔ (taa yɛ 10-12%) a ɛwɔ tete token no ho no fi hɔ. Eyi nso ma kwan ma wode tokens yi kɔ blockchains foforo so te sɛ Ethereum, Base, ne nea ɛkeka ho denam Axelar so.
questions.q2: So ahobammɔ wɔ Freedom Bridge dwumadie mu?
questions.a2: Aane. Protocol no fa Migration contract a ahobammɔ wɔ mu ne Axelar Interchain Token Service adwuma. Sɛ wode kɔ TigerOG mu a, wɔhyew wo BNBTiger koraa na woanya TigerOG 1:1. Eyi hwɛ sɛ sika dodow no bɛyɛ pɛ wɔ chains nyinaa so.
questions.a3: Freedom Bridge nnye sika biara wɔ nkyekyere no ho. Wotua blockchain gas aka a ɛwɔ hɔ dada no nko ara. Sɛ wode sika refi chain baako kɔ foforo so a, wotua ntam chain gas aka ma Axelar.
questions.q4: Sɛ me tokens yera a, dɛn na ɛbɛsi?
questions.a4: TigerOG tokens yɛ ERC20 tokens pɛpɛɛpɛ. Sɛ wo wallet kwan yera a, wontumi nnya sika no bio. Kae wo private keys ne recovery phrases bere biara.
questions.q5: So mebetumi asan de me TigerOG tokens akɔ BNBTiger mu?
questions.a5: Dabi. Nkyekyere yi yɛ akwantuo baako. Sɛ wode BNBTiger kɔ TigerOG mu a, wɔahyew wo BNBTiger no koraa. Wɔayɛ no saa na TigerOG adi tete token no anammu koraa a toɔ biara nni mu.
questions.a6: Yɛboa EVM chains pii denam Axelar so, a BNB Chain, Ethereum, Base, ne nea ɛkeka ho ka ho. Hwɛ Wiki no na wubehu nyinaa.
questions.q7: Nkabom no gye bere dodow bɛn?
questions.a7: Ntɛm a nkabom no bɛyɛ no gyina chain a wode refi aseɛ no ne Axelar so. Taa ɛgye miniti 2-5.
questions.q8: TigerOG sika dodow a ɛredidi mu yɛ deɛn?
questions.a8: OG token biara wɔ sika a ɛredidi mu a ɛnsesa a efi BNB token a ɛwɔ hɔ dada no mu, a wɔabu tokens a wɔahyew, contract a asi, ne LP a wɔato mu. TigerOG: ~3.66 septillion (36.62% of original). LionOG: ~3.83 septillion (38.33% of original). FrogOG: ~8.39 septillion (83.86% of original). Hwɛ Wiki no ma nkyekyɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri.

common.failedToSwitchNetwork: Antumi ansesa network. Sesa wɔ wo wallet mu.
common.unableToDetermineGas: Antumi anhu Axelar gas a wɔbetua
